pageSevenSign.tips1: 1. Deposit the specified amount daily to receive high rewards when signing in
pageSevenSign.tips2: 2. Sign-in rewards will be automatically added to your account
pageSevenSign.tips3: 3. Players must complete the specified tasks to receive corresponding rewards
pageSevenSign.tips4: 4. Each player can only claim sign-in rewards once a day. If you miss a day, you'll need to sign in again within the timeframe to receive the rewards based on your last sign-in date
pageSevenSign.tips5: 5. In case of cheating or any violations, the company reserves the right to disqualify players and forfeit rewards
pageSevenSign.tips6: 6. PGNEW reserves the right to interpret all the rules of this activity

publicBottom.tps1: Welcome to endless luck here! In our casino, you'll experience thrilling gambling fun and captivating games; enjoy unparalleled entertainment and bonuses!
publicBottom.tps2: Exclusive and hottest new games are making their debut! Exclusively operated by PGNEW, you can experience unprecedented gaming excitement. Join us and enjoy a unique gaming experience, only at PGNEW!

pageIndex.casino_Introduction: Explore our extensive in-house games, live casinos, and slot machines, and experience exciting casino adventures.
pageIndex.reward: Join us to create an extraordinary world
pageIndex.tips1: Explore the exciting casino and enjoy the ultimate gaming journey!
pageIndex.tips2: Partner with us to promote popular games and earn generous commissions!

pageMenuSignRule.r1: 1. Members can sign in daily starting at midnight
pageMenuSignRule.r2: 2. Daily sign-ins grant 1 free spin each
pageMenuSignRule.r3: 3. Spin counts cannot accumulate; they reset daily
pageMenuSignRule.r4: 4. The signed-in amount is directly deposited into the member's balance; please check it promptly
pageMenuSignRule.r5: 5. Illegally increasing spin counts may result in account suspension
pageMenuSignRule.r6: 6. The final interpretation right belongs to the platform

pageAgentPromotion.tips: Commissions are settled daily. Earn more rewards by referring friends!

pageSettingBrief.a1: 1. What should I do if I forget my password?
pageSettingBrief.a2: If you forget your password, you can reset your password via our 'Forgot Password' link within 15 seconds. After applying for a password reset, please follow the instructions in the email we send you to reset your password.
pageSettingBrief.a3: 2. How can I reset my Google Authenticator if I lost my phone?
pageSettingBrief.a4: If you wish to remove the Google Authenticator 2FA, please contact us. Once we receive your request, you will need to answer several security questions correctly to remove 2FA for your account's safety.
pageSettingBrief.a5: 3. Can I change my username or registered email address?
pageSettingBrief.a6: Sorry, we can't update this information. If you insist on changing your username or registered email address, we recommend closing the current account and registering a new one.
pageSettingBrief.a8: Exclusive VIP Clubs are invite-only, and you will receive your VIP status notification via email once you embark on your gaming journey.

pageMenuSignInBtn.a1: 1. What should I do if I forget my password?
pageMenuSignInBtn.a2: If you forget your password, you can reset your password via our 'Forgot Password' link within 15 seconds. After applying for a password reset, please follow the instructions in the email we send you to reset your password.
pageMenuSignInBtn.a3: 2. How can I reset my Google Authenticator if I lost my phone?
pageMenuSignInBtn.a4: If you wish to remove Google Authenticator 2FA, please contact us. Once we receive your request, for the safety of your account, you need to correctly answer several security questions to remove 2FA.
pageMenuSignInBtn.a5: 3. Can I change my username or registered email address?
pageMenuSignInBtn.a6: We are sorry, but we cannot update this information. If you insist on changing your username or registered email address, we recommend closing your current account and registering a new one.
pageMenuSignInBtn.a7: 4. How can I become a VIP?
pageMenuSignInBtn.a8: Exclusive VIP Clubs are by invitation only. When you embark on your gaming journey, you will receive a VIP status notification via email.

pageSettingHelp.g1: Can I register on your website?
pageSettingHelp.g2: You must be at least 18 years old or of the legal age of majority in your jurisdiction. Your local laws must allow you to play online games. For more information, please read our terms and conditions. Gaming can be addictive; we recommend players to practice self-control.
pageSettingHelp.a1: 1. What should I do if I forget my password?
pageSettingHelp.a2: If you forget your password, you can reset your password via our 'Forgot Password' link within 15 seconds. After applying for a password reset, please follow the instructions in the email we send you to reset your password.
pageSettingHelp.a3: 2. How can I reset my Google Authenticator if I lost my phone?
pageSettingHelp.a4: If you wish to remove Google Authenticator 2FA, please contact us. Once we receive your request, for the safety of your account, you need to correctly answer several security questions to remove 2FA.
pageSettingHelp.a5: 3. Can I change my username or registered email address?

pageSettingHelp.a7: 4. How can I become a VIP?
pageSettingHelp.a8: Exclusive VIP Clubs are by invitation only. When you embark on your gaming journey, you will receive a VIP status notification via email.

pageChatRule.t1: 1. Do not send spam, harass, or offend other users. Also, avoid using all uppercase letters! No one likes to be yelled at.
pageChatRule.t2: 2. Do not beg or request loans, send red envelopes, or send tips.
pageChatRule.t3: 3. Please do not participate in any form of advertising/transaction/sale/purchase or provision of services.
pageChatRule.t5: 5. Do not engage in false advertising, scams, or the spread of fake news.
pageChatRule.t6: 6. Do not send inappropriate content such as explicit, violent, horror, sexual, or bloody messages that are not suitable for direct dissemination.
pageChatRule.t7: 7. Do not engage in abusive language, threats, defamation, malicious attacks, or any behavior that harms the interests of others.
pageChatRule.t8: 8. Do not engage in spreading harmful information, such as insults and discrimination within specific groups.
pageChatRule.t9: 9. If a user is suspected of violating the above prohibitions, the platform will take certain measures for processing; for example, suspending or banning the user's account, or deleting messages, etc.
pageChatRule.t10: 10. The platform reserves the final interpretation.
